passes.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > h6

all.message: There are no other links with the same name, that go to a different URL
